titleStmt.title: Description of Center for Advanced Judaic Studies Library, Halper 17: Deuteronomy 1:15-25; Deuteronomy 1:31-36

notesStmt.note: Verse endings signified by a colon; Halper 16 (bifolium) contains Deuteronomy I 15 טובה הארץ 25 - ושרי חמשים; Halper 17 (fol.) contains ibid. 31 מלא אחרי 36 - אל[היך] אשר ישא.
Condition: complete, consecutive; erased and faded in some parts.

msIdentifier.repository: Center for Advanced Judaic Studies Library

layoutDesc.layout: Columns: 1; lines: 10; ruling method: left rule justified by a single character.

history.provenance: Cairo Genizah Collection (University of Pennsylvania. Center for Advanced Judaic Studies. Library).
